summary: This document is an email forwarding a Miami Herald article about Jeffrey Epstein's exploitation of women, specifically highlighting his use of doctors and therapists to further his abuse. The email expresses concern about the chilling nature of the reporting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded Miami Herald article, described as manipulating and using women, and reportedly using doctors and therapists to further exploitation.

events.title: Publication of Miami Herald article on Epstein's exploitation
events.description: The Miami Herald publishes an article detailing how Jeffrey Epstein manipulated and used women, and his use of doctors and therapists to further his exploitation.

keyFacts: The document forwards a Miami Herald article from September 21, 2019, about Jeffrey Epstein's exploitation of women.
The article reports that Epstein used doctors and therapists to further his exploitation of victims.
The email sender comments that the reporting on this aspect is 'chilling'.
